question: [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Function: CreateNewProposal()] [Params Validation] At line 153, are proposal.Params validated for correct format and size to prevent DOS during proposal execution? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Function: CreateNewProposal()] [Event Emission] At lines 165-171, ProposalCreated event is fired—can this leak sensitive information or be manipulated? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Function: CreateNewProposal()] [Return Value] At line 172, proposalId is returned—can callers misuse this to manipulate proposal state immediately? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Function: CreateNewProposal()] [Expiry Validation] Is input.ExpiredTime validated to prevent setting proposals that expire immediately or never expire? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Function: CheckCreateProposalInput()] [Null Input] If input parameter is null, do lines 178-183 throw NullReferenceException before assertions? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Function: CheckCreateProposalInput()] [Length Check] At line 178, does Title.Length include encoding considerations for multi-byte characters that could exceed MaxLengthForTitle? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Function: CheckCreateProposalInput()] [Length Check] At line 180, can Description.Length validation be bypassed with special characters or encoding to store more data than intended? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Function: CheckCreateProposalInput()] [Length Check] At line 182, does ProposalDescriptionUrl.Length correctly limit URL size considering percent-encoding expansion? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Function: CheckCreateProposalInput()] [Missing Validation] Does this function validate other critical fields like OrganizationAddress, ToAddress, ContractMethodName, or ExpiredTime? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Function: CheckCreateProposalInput()] [Null Strings] If input.Title, input.Description, or input.ProposalDescriptionUrl are null, do length checks throw exception? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Function: CheckCreateProposalInput()] [Empty Strings] Does the function allow empty strings for Title and Description, potentially creating proposals with no identifying information? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Cross-Function] [State Consistency] Can organization data be modified while proposals are being voted on, affecting threshold calculations across IsProposalRejected, IsProposalAbstained, and CheckEnoughVoteAndApprovals? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Cross-Function] [Threshold Manipulation] If MaximalRejectionThreshold, MaximalAbstentionThreshold, or MinimalApprovalThreshold are modified in Organization after proposal creation, do existing proposals use old or new thresholds? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Cross-Function] [Member List Changes] Can OrganizationMemberList be modified after proposal creation, allowing non-members at creation time to vote, or preventing original members from voting? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Cross-Function] [Proposer List Changes] Can ProposerWhiteList be modified to remove a proposer after they've created a proposal, affecting proposal validity? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Cross-Function] [Vote Counting] Across IsProposalRejected, IsProposalAbstained, and CheckEnoughVoteAndApprovals, can the same address vote multiple times if they appear in different lists? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Cross-Function] [Integer Arithmetic] Do threshold addition operations in Validate(Organization) at lines 77-80 match arithmetic used in vote counting functions to prevent inconsistencies? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Cross-Function] [Gas Exhaustion] Can an attacker create organizations with maximum member counts and proposals with maximum votes to cause gas exhaustion across all voting functions? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Cross-Function] [Validation Timing] Are organizations validated with Validate(Organization) before being stored, or can invalid organizations exist in State.Organizations? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Cross-Function] [Proposal Expiry] After a proposal expires per Validate(ProposalInfo) line 89 check, can it still be voted on or released through other contract functions? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Cross-Function] [Authority Propagation] Does AssertIsAuthorizedProposer prevent unauthorized proposal creation before CreateNewProposal is called, or is authorization checked elsewhere? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Attack Scenario] [Governance Takeover] Can an attacker create an organization with MinimalApprovalThreshold=1, single member, and become the sole proposer to gain complete control? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Attack Scenario] [Threshold Deadlock] Can conflicting threshold settings in Validate(Organization) create organizations where no proposal can ever pass or be rejected? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Attack Scenario] [Vote Manipulation] Can an attacker vote Approve with one address, then vote Reject with another, having both votes count in CheckEnoughVoteAndApprovals line 56 total? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association_Helper.cs] [Attack Scenario] [Proposal Spam] Can an attacker create unlimited proposals in CreateNewProposal by generating unique tokens, exhausting storage and causing DOS? (High)
